title: An Essay on the Nature and Conduct of the Passions and Affections, with Illustrations on the Moral Sense
fulltitle:
AN

ESSAY

ON THE

Nature and Conduct

OF THE

Passions and Affections.

WITH

ILLUSTRATIONS

ON THE

MORAL SENSE.
comments: Three editions of Hutcheson's Essay and Illustrations were published in the author's lifetime. The second (1730) was merely a reprint of the first, but the third (1742) contained some significant revisions. Consequently the third is our copytext. The text was derived from Aaron Garrett's edition (Indianapolis: Liberty Fund, 2002), which follows the first edition (noting significant differences between this and third). This source text has been substantially altered, to bring the text in line with the 1742 edition.
